description: Comprehensive test cases for Login page covering success scenarios, failure scenarios, navigation, session persistence, and page load functionality

testCases.description: Verify login page loads with all required elements visible
steps: Check that ID input field is visible and enabled
Check that Password input field is visible and enabled
Verify Login button is visible and enabled
Check that page title and branding are displayed
Verify no error messages are shown initially
testCases.expectedResult: Login page loads with all required elements (ID field, Password field, Login button) visible and functional

testCases.description: Verify login page responsive design on different screen sizes
steps: Verify all elements are properly sized and positioned
Check that form is centered and readable
Verify buttons are touch-friendly on mobile
testCases.expectedResult: Login page displays correctly across all screen sizes with proper element sizing and positioning

testCases.description: Verify form field labels and placeholders are displayed
steps: Verify ID field has appropriate label or placeholder
Verify Password field has appropriate label or placeholder
Check that field labels are clear and descriptive
Verify required field indicators if present
Check that field types are correct (text for ID, password for Password)
testCases.expectedResult: Form fields have clear labels/placeholders and correct input types

testCases.description: Verify login button styling and states
steps: Verify Login button is styled appropriately
Verify button text is clear and actionable
testCases.expectedResult: Login button has proper styling with appropriate hover, focus, and state indicators

testCases.description: Verify successful login with valid credentials
steps: Verify successful redirect to dashboard or next page
testCases.expectedResult: Login is successful with valid credentials and user is redirected to the appropriate page

testCases.description: Verify login failure with invalid ID
steps: Check that user remains on login page
Verify form fields are cleared or retain values as per design
testCases.expectedResult: Login fails with appropriate error message for invalid ID and user remains on login page

testCases.description: Verify login failure with invalid password
steps: Check that user remains on login page
Verify form fields are cleared or retain values as per design
testCases.expectedResult: Login fails with appropriate error message for invalid password and user remains on login page

testCases.description: Verify login failure with empty fields
steps: Verify validation error messages are displayed
Check that both fields show required field errors
Verify user remains on login page
testCases.expectedResult: Validation errors are shown for empty required fields and login is prevented

testCases.description: Verify login failure with empty ID field only
steps: Verify ID field validation error is displayed
Check that Password field does not show error
Verify user remains on login page
testCases.expectedResult: ID field validation error is shown while Password field remains valid

testCases.description: Verify login failure with empty password field only
steps: Verify Password field validation error is displayed
Check that ID field does not show error
Verify user remains on login page
testCases.expectedResult: Password field validation error is shown while ID field remains valid

testCases.description: Verify navigation to homework page after successful login
steps: Verify user is authenticated and can access the page
testCases.expectedResult: User can successfully navigate to homework page after login and page loads with proper authentication

testCases.description: Verify navigation to homeworkNew page after successful login
steps: Verify user is authenticated and can access the page
testCases.expectedResult: User can successfully navigate to homeworkNew page after login and page loads with proper authentication

testCases.description: Verify session persistence across page navigation
steps: Enter valid credentials and login successfully
testCases.expectedResult: User session persists across page navigation and browser refresh without requiring re-login

testCases.description: Verify session timeout handling
steps: Enter valid credentials and login successfully
Wait for session timeout (if applicable) or simulate timeout
Verify user is redirected to login page
Verify session timeout message is displayed
testCases.expectedResult: Session timeout is handled properly with appropriate redirect to login page and re-authentication requirement

testCases.description: Verify logout functionality
steps: Enter valid credentials and login successfully
Verify access is denied and redirect to login
testCases.expectedResult: Logout functionality works correctly and user is properly logged out with session termination

testCases.description: Verify form submission with Enter key
steps: Press Enter key while in Password field
Test with invalid credentials and Enter key
Verify error handling works with Enter key submission
testCases.expectedResult: Form submission works correctly with Enter key for both valid and invalid credentials

testCases.description: Verify multiple failed login attempts handling
steps: Enter invalid credentials multiple times (3-5 attempts)
Verify error messages are displayed for each attempt
Check if account lockout occurs after multiple failures
Verify appropriate security measures are in place
Test with valid credentials after multiple failures
Verify system behavior with repeated failed attempts
testCases.expectedResult: Multiple failed login attempts are handled appropriately with proper error messages and security measures

testCases.description: Verify browser back button behavior after login
steps: Enter valid credentials and login successfully
Verify user cannot access login page while authenticated
Verify redirect to appropriate authenticated page
testCases.expectedResult: Browser navigation works correctly after login with proper redirect handling for authenticated users

testCases.description: Verify direct access to protected pages without login
steps: Verify no unauthorized access is allowed
Check that proper authentication flow is enforced
testCases.expectedResult: Direct access to protected pages redirects to login page and prevents unauthorized access

testCases.description: Verify login page load performance
steps: Verify page loads within acceptable time (under 3 seconds)
Check that all resources load completely
Verify no broken images or missing assets
testCases.expectedResult: Login page loads within acceptable time with all resources loading completely

testCases.description: Verify authentication response time
steps: Verify authentication completes within acceptable time (under 5 seconds)
Verify loading indicators are shown during authentication
testCases.expectedResult: Authentication completes within acceptable time with proper loading indicators

testCases.description: Verify keyboard navigation on login page
steps: Use Tab key to navigate through all elements
Verify focus order is logical (ID field, Password field, Login button)
Verify all interactive elements are accessible via keyboard
Check that focus indicators are visible
Test Enter key activation on focused elements
testCases.expectedResult: All interactive elements are accessible via keyboard with logical tab order and visible focus indicators

testCases.description: Verify screen reader compatibility
steps: Navigate to login page with screen reader
Verify all form fields have proper labels
Check that error messages are announced
Check that page structure is logical for screen readers
testCases.expectedResult: Login page is fully accessible to screen readers with proper labels and announcements

testCases.description: Verify high contrast mode support
steps: Verify all elements are visible and readable
Check that form fields are clearly defined
Test login functionality in high contrast mode
testCases.expectedResult: Login page is fully functional and accessible in high contrast mode

testCases.description: Verify form validation accessibility
steps: Verify validation errors are announced by screen reader
Check that error messages are associated with correct fields
Verify error announcements are clear and actionable
Check that focus moves to error fields
testCases.expectedResult: Form validation is accessible with proper error announcements and field associations

testCases.description: Verify password field security
steps: Verify password is masked (dots or asterisks)
Check that password is not visible in page source
Verify password is not stored in browser autocomplete inappropriately
Test password field behavior on different browsers
testCases.expectedResult: Password field properly masks input and handles password securely

testCases.description: Verify HTTPS security
steps: Verify page is served over HTTPS
Verify secure connection indicator in browser
Test form submission over secure connection
Check that sensitive data is transmitted securely
testCases.expectedResult: Login page uses HTTPS with valid SSL certificate and secure data transmission

testCases.description: Verify session security
steps: Check that session cookies are secure
Verify session tokens are properly generated
Verify no sensitive data in URL parameters
Check that session data is properly encrypted
testCases.expectedResult: Session management is secure with proper cookie handling and token generation

testCases.description: Verify handling of special characters in credentials
steps: Verify system handles special characters correctly
Check that special characters don't break authentication
testCases.expectedResult: System handles special characters in credentials appropriately without breaking authentication

testCases.description: Verify handling of very long input strings
steps: Enter extremely long ID string (1000+ characters)
Enter extremely long password string (1000+ characters)
Verify system handles long inputs gracefully
Check that input length limits are enforced
Verify no system errors or crashes occur
testCases.expectedResult: System handles extremely long input strings gracefully with appropriate length limits

testCases.description: Verify handling of rapid form submissions
steps: Rapidly click Login button multiple times
Verify only one authentication request is processed
Check that duplicate submissions are prevented
Test with rapid Enter key presses
testCases.expectedResult: System prevents duplicate form submissions and handles rapid user interactions gracefully

testCases.description: Verify handling of browser refresh during login
steps: Check that no partial session state is created
Verify user can retry login after refresh
testCases.expectedResult: System handles browser refresh during login gracefully without creating partial session states

testCases.description: Verify handling of network interruption during login
steps: Verify appropriate error message is displayed
Check that no partial authentication state exists
testCases.expectedResult: System handles network interruptions during login with appropriate error messages and recovery options

testCases.description: Verify handling of multiple browser tabs
steps: Open login page in multiple browser tabs
Check other tabs for authentication state
Verify session is shared across tabs
Test concurrent login attempts from different tabs
testCases.expectedResult: Authentication state is properly synchronized across multiple browser tabs
